name: Billard
description:
A simple pool-table. Shoot, move the balls around... play as you see fit.

Unity HTML template by Sean.

• Controls :
 > L-Click and hold to charge a shot. Release to shoot. R-Click to cancel.
 > R-Click to drag balls in and out of the table.
 > Hold R to restart.
 > Z to undo/redo the last move.
